hero.intro: I build modern, performant web applications with a focus on user experience and clean code. Passionate about React, TypeScript, and creating delightful interfaces.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Get to know more about my background and expertise
about.intro: Hi! I'm Sebastian, a software developer passionate about creating beautiful, functional web applications. I specialize in frontend development with a strong focus on user experience and modern web technologies.
about.experience: With several years of experience in the field, I've worked on a variety of projects ranging from small business websites to large-scale applications. I love solving complex problems and turning ideas into reality through code.
about.personal: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source, or sharing my knowledge through blog posts and tutorials.
